question: Which space mission of India has completed one full year in the lunar orbit?
explanation:
Chandrayaan-2 is Indiaâ€™s first mission to make a soft-landing of a rover on the South pole of the moon.
It is also India's second lunar mission, which has recently completed one full year around the moon. Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) has announced that all of its instruments are performing well and there is adequate fuel to keep it functional for about seven more years.
